welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Barton, a charming city known for its friendly locals and beautiful natural scenery. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all the hidden gems this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Elmira Corning Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Elmira Corning Regional Airport serves regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network to stay connected during their travels.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Binghamton Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Greater Binghamton Airport is used for private and charter flights and is equipped with facilities for pilots and passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free by selecting 'BGM Airport WiFi' in their device's network settings.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tompkins County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Tompkins County Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
